channel.title: Broken image in account creation email template
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
The account creation email template (https://github.com/getredash/redash/blob/master/redash/templates/emails/layout.html) uses an image asset from Intercom that no longer exists: https://uploads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/4065702/d84531c526da5329fd25542a/File1454836961491 which results in a broken image in emails.
Happy to put in a PR if that's the easiest way to resolve!
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: v10.1.0 * Browser/OS: Firefox 97, Ubuntu 21.1 * How did you install Redash: AWS v8 AMI + manual upgrade

item.title: Broken image in account creation email template
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Thanks! Will get this reviewed and merged once the circleci build job completes

Read full topic

The account creation email template (redash/layout.html at master · getredash/redash · GitHub) uses an image asset from Intercom that no longer exists: https://uploads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/4065702/d84531c526da5329fd25542a/File1454836961491 which results in a broken image in emails.
